body:
I noticed that one of my pods had restarted on another node but didn't go to `Ready` state after a few minutes. I found this in in `kubectl describe po/...`:

```
  Type     Reason                 Age                From                       Message
  ----     ------                 ----               ----                       -------
  Normal   Scheduled              29m                default-scheduler          Successfully assigned kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-rrzrb to node-a
  Normal   SuccessfulMountVolume  29m                kubelet, node-a  MountVolume.SetUp succeeded for volume "config-volume"
  Normal   SuccessfulMountVolume  29m                kubelet, node-a  MountVolume.SetUp succeeded for volume "kissable-manta-prometheus-server-token-mlq5w"
  Warning  FailedMount            29m (x4 over 29m)  kubelet, node-a  MountVolume.SetUp failed for volume "pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c" : mount command failed, status: Failure, reason: Rook: Mount volume failed: failed to attach volume pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c. Volume is already attached by pod default/kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-jwhs5. Status Running
  Warning  FailedMount            28m                kubelet, node-a  MountVolume.SetUp failed for volume "pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c" : mount command failed, status: Failure, reason: Rook: Mount volume failed: failed to attach volume replicapool/pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c: failed to map image replicapool/pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c cluster rook. failed to map image replicapool/pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c: Failed to complete rbd: signal: interrupt. output: 2017-10-13 20:34:42.192986 7fdde865f0c0 -1 did not load config file, using default settings.
2017-10-13 20:34:42.196155 7fdde865f0c0 -1 Errors while parsing config file!
2017-10-13 20:34:42.196162 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open /etc/ceph/rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2017-10-13 20:34:42.196163 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open ~/.ceph/rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2017-10-13 20:34:42.196163 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2017-10-13 20:34:42.198193 7fdde865f0c0 -1 Errors while parsing config file!
2017-10-13 20:34:42.198200 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open /etc/ceph/rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2017-10-13 20:34:42.198201 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open ~/.ceph/rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
2017-10-13 20:34:42.198201 7fdde865f0c0 -1 parse_file: cannot open rook.conf: (2) No such file or directory
  Warning  FailedSync   15m (x6 over 27m)  kubelet, node-a  Error syncing pod
  Warning  FailedMount  9m (x9 over 27m)   kubelet, node-a  Unable to mount volumes for pod "kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-rrzrb_default(eaefce7b-b055-11e7-bf0e-525400f15fe7)": timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach/mount for pod "default"/"kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-rrzrb". list of unattached/unmounted volumes=[storage-volume]
  Warning  FailedMount  3m (x15 over 27m)  kubelet, node-a  MountVolume.SetUp failed for volume "pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c" : mount command failed, status: Failure, reason: Rook: Mount volume failed: failed to attach volume pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c. Volume is already attached by pod default/kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-rrzrb. Status Pending
```

The `rook-agent` on the node is in `Running` state. However I do see it complaining about this in its logs:

```
2017-10-13 21:04:12.930663 E | rook-flexdriver: Attach volume replicapool/pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c failed: failed to attach volume pvc-737b86de-b015-11e7-a446-52540068863c. Volume is already attached by pod default/kissable-manta-prometheus-server-697cb4c4cb-rrzrb. Status Pending
```
